notes: used countably to mean a cup of coffee

example_sentence_italian: I caffè del centro sono molto affollati.
example_sentence_english: The cafés/coffees in the center are very crowded.

example_sentence_italian: Vorrei dei caffè da portare via.
example_sentence_english: I'd like some coffees to take away.

example_sentence_italian: Il sapore del caffè è intenso.
example_sentence_english: The taste of the coffee is strong.

translation_english: to the café / to the coffee
to the cafés / to the coffees
from the café / from the coffee
example_sentence_italian: Ho preso il giornale dal caffè.
example_sentence_english: I took the newspaper from the café.

example_sentence_italian: Vengono molti clienti dai caffè del centro.
example_sentence_english: Many customers come from the cafés downtown.

translation_english: in the coffee / in the café
example_sentence_english: There is some milk in the coffee.

example_sentence_italian: Nei caffè della città si incontrano persone interessanti.
example_sentence_english: In the city's cafés you meet interesting people.
There is foam on the coffee.

translation_english: on the coffees / on the cafés
example_sentence_italian: Ci sono offerte sui caffè artigianali.
example_sentence_english: There are offers on artisanal coffees.
I have some bread with the coffee.
They arrived with the hot coffees.
